channel.title: Ssrs on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Ssrs on Automaly
channel.managingEditor: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
channel.webMaster: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)

item.title: Document Reporting Services (SSRS)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) for creating and managing business documents and reports in Dynamics 365 Finance Operations.

item.title: Create parameters, manipulate query for SSRS type query
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Build custom SSRS query-based reports in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations with parameters and query manipulation. Complete guide with contract, UIBuilder, and controller classes.

item.title: How to remove SSRS reports in FinOps Cloud-Hosted
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Remove SSRS reports from Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations Cloud-Hosted environments using Report Server Configuration Manager or PowerShell scripts. Two methods for report cleanup and management.

item.title: Deploy SSRS reports in Dynamics 365 Finance, SCM using Powershell
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Deploy SSRS reports to Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations environments using PowerShell scripts. Automate report deployment for all reports or specific reports with DeployAllReportsToSSRS script.

item.title: How To d365fo.tools
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Master d365fo.tools PowerShell module for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations automation. Comprehensive guide covering installation, environment management, database operations, and SSRS deployment.

item.title: Extend the standard reports in Dynamics 365 finance and operations (CustAccountStatementExt)
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete tutorial for extending standard Customer Account Statement reports in D365 Finance Operations using SSRS, COC extensions, and customization techniques.

item.title: Expressions or Functions used in SSRS
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Comprehensive reference guide covering all SSRS expressions and functions including globals, operators, text, date/time, math, and aggregate functions for SQL Server Reporting Services.

item.title: Only integrated security is supported for AX queries
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Fix “Only integrated security is supported for AX queries” error when running reports in Dynamics AX 2012 after database restore. Solution involves redeploying reports using PowerShell Publish-AXReport command.

item.title: SSRS Report Server Settings Validation Error- AX 2012 R3 CU9
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Resolve SSRS Report Server settings validation error in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 CU9 by disabling UAC through registry modification. Fix for Web Service URL and Report Manager URL configuration issues.

item.title: How to install two instances SSRS on one server
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to install and configure two SSRS instances on one server for multiple AX 2012 environments. Includes configuration steps, registry changes, and PowerShell commands for proper setup.

item.title: How to deploy all the reports in AX2012 by using Management Shell
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Quick guide to deploy all SSRS reports in Dynamics AX 2012 using PowerShell Management Shell with the Publish-AXReport command. Step-by-step process for report deployment.
